title: Steps to Solving
text: Solve the first equation for $$x$$ and then substitute the resulting expression into the second equation.

title: Solving for $$y$$
text: To solve, expand the equation and move everything to one side.

title: Factorizable
text: The equation for $$y$$ is easily factorizable once set to zero.

title: Solve for $$x$$
text: To solve for $$x$$, substitute each value for $$y$$ into the first equation of $$x-y=-1$$ to solve for $$x$$.
